Text:
Hey...thanks for trying to fix. I'll try this one and post back afterwards. :D

Great collection.

I just got done listening to this whole collection and it sounds pretty perfect to me. Thanks so much for sharing this and fixing it. 

I'm in awe of how great these discs sound after all these years...just goes to show you what a proper mastering job can do. These days it's all about loud, loud, loud, but they did a really great job on this set.

Love it!
Barber9  Thank you for a great Torrent. I will seed for a few months.
